snippet: Col. Tara A. Osborn, an Army chief circuit judge, was appointed Tuesday as the new judge in the trial of Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, the Army psychiatrist charged in the 2009 shooting rampage at Fort Hood.
abstract: Army chief circuit judge Col Tara A Osborn is appointed as new judge in trial of Maj Nidal Malik Hasan, Army psychiatrist charged in 2009 shooting rampage at Fort Hood, Tex, after military appeals court ordered removal of previous judge for displaying appearance of bias.
lead_paragraph: Col. Tara A. Osborn, an Army chief circuit judge, was appointed Tuesday as the new judge in the trial of Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, the Army psychiatrist charged in the 2009 shooting rampage at Fort Hood.

headline.seo: Texas: New Judge in Fort Hood Shooting Case
headline.main: Texas: New Judge in Fort Hood Shooting Case
headline.print_headline: Texas: New Judge In Fort Hood Shooting Case
